name: webcomponentsplayground
description: Testing out web component build tools and frameworks

scripts.getAngularSize: echo 'Angular:' && gzip-size angular/dist/angular/browser/main.js --include-original && echo 'Angular Polyfills:' && gzip-size angular/dist/angular/browser/polyfills.js --include-original
scripts.getPlainSize: echo 'Plain:' && gzip-size plain/financingCalculator.js --include-original && echo '+' && gzip-size plain/scrollHeadline.js --include-original
scripts.getStencilSize: echo 'Stencil:' && echo 'index' && gzip-size stencil/dist/stencil/index-16ae0836.js --include-original && echo '+ financing-calculator' && gzip-size stencil/dist/stencil/financing-calculator.entry.js --include-original && echo '+ scroll-headline' && gzip-size stencil/dist/stencil/scroll-headline.entry.js --include-original
scripts.getVueSize: echo 'Vue:' && echo ''app.js && gzip-size vue/dist/js/app.js --include-original && echo ''+ chunk-vendors.js && gzip-size vue/dist/js/chunk-vendors.js --include-original
scripts.getAllSizes: npm run getAngularSize && npm run getAtomicoSize && npm run getLitSize && npm run getPlainSize && npm run getPreactSize && npm run getReactSize && npm run getReactWithWrapperSize && npm run getStencilSize && npm run getSvelteSize && npm run getVueSize
